It's a classic game. You should play it because it's not only a great puzzle game, but a great game in general. The atmosphere is amazing. Not only that but it is very replayable. Every time I complete it I find myself wanting to go again and complete it faster.
The game's almost 13 years old and it still holds up. A bit on the short side but it's still a great game, would recommend if you somehow haven't played already.

und den Alternativen Lösungen, die man im Kampf mit dieser ungewöhnlichen Waffe findet.
doch ich empfehle es in Häppchen durchzuspielen, weil es doch nur fünf, maximal sechs Stunden Spielspaß liefert.
Игра прикольная, но очень короткая. Я прошёл где то за час с половиной. В игре делается упор на головоломки. Для некоторых это игра послужит хорошим развитием мышления.

It was very interesting, felt much easier than Portal 2 in my opinion.
Portal 2 was much more story based but the first Portal didn't had that much which was good too!

I would recommend it 9/10.

Its pretty fun,  however if you have friends that have some money i'd recommend getting portal 2, since that has co-op. If you want to start the story from the beginning then i suppose get portal, however, both games are great and you should get them.

Esse é um jogo de resolver quebra-cabeças (bem divertido, diga-se de passagem); a história é quase inexistente (principalmente na primeira metade do jogo) e bem direta: resolva áreas de teste para poder prosseguir e tente escapar - é legal usar a portal gun e criar você mesmo seus caminhos para as soluções dos puzzles. A jogabilidade é um pouco desajeitada e o gameplay se torna um tanto repetitivo depois de um tempo, mas como o jogo é curto, dá pra relevar.

No mais, é um conceito bem original e interessante, e que entrete bem!   

[spoiler]Ps.: o bolo NÃO é uma mentira![/spoiler]

Bought this game back in December but didn't start playing it (and finish it) until yesterday at the time of writing this review. The game is short but to compensate it has a few secrets for you to explore, it has good humour AND it's a puzzle game, so you'll prolly get stuck in some places like I did :P
Considering this is a game that released back in 2007 I think the graphics still are holding up pretty well to this day. Can't wait to start Portal 2

실험실 치곤 독특한 실험.

A fun as hell puzzle game, although extremely short (you could probably beat it within a day). The story and lore of Portal is interesting and fun to get into. The character of Glados is entertaining, while still being somewhat threatening. A lot of the first half of the game is basically just introducing mechanics, like how portals work, cubes, buttons, turrets, etc, but it does it in a way that doesn't feel boring or intrusive. It flows very well with the gameplay, and there still is the challenge of figuring out how to complete the puzzles (although the challenge is somewhat low). If you want more of a challenge, then you're in luck, because the game also comes with bonus "advanced" stages which are essentially harder versions of chambers 13-18. It also has different "challenge" modes, where you have to complete the chambers in a certain amount of steps, portals and time.

However, I strongly believe Portal 2 is better than this one, simply because it has so much more content and so many more levels. It's a lot more humorous and it introduces 2 more mainline story characters, Cave Johnson and Wheatley, who are both a great laugh and reveal more about the lore of the Portal universe. It could be argued that the simple charm of this one is gone from its sequel, but to me all the other factors completely outweigh this.

Definitely get this, it's worth your time and the price is fair.

Experiencing this game for the first time in 2020 and it gives me the feeling of freshness, unique, and different from other games, VALVE games is always revolutionary.

The game is good, but not nearly as good as Portal 2. If you enjoyed Portal 2 or are starting the series for the first time, this is still great and worth a playthrough. Just know that if you're going for all the achievements, this game is EXTREMELY annoying to complete unless you're willing to use the console command strategy.
